title: HBL CarLoan Training Document
author: HBL Training Department
summary: This training guide covers the HBL CarLoan, outlining the following key areas: eligibility criteria (minimum age, income requirements), features (loan amounts, repayment periods), target customers (individuals, salaried employees), and applicable charges (processing fees, late payment penalties). It aims to equip users with the knowledge necessary to address questions regarding the CarLoan product.
